component.name: MarkupGridItem
component.script:
sub init() m.top.id = "markupgriditem" m.itemmask = m.top.findNode("itemMask") m.itemmask.font.size = 20 end sub
sub showcontent() itemcontent = m.top.itemContent m.itemmask.text = itemcontent.title end sub
sub showfocus() if m.top.focusPercent > 0.3 then m.itemmask.font = "font:MediumBoldSystemFont" m.itemmask.font.size = 25
else m.itemmask.font = "font:SmallestSystemFont" m.itemmask.font.size = 20 end if end sub
